title: Kiteretsu Daihyakka
synopsis: The main character is a scientific genius boy named Kiteretsu, who has built a companion robot named Korosuke. He frequently travels in time with his friends and Korosuke in the time machine he built. Miyoko is a girl in his neighborhood who is basically his girlfriend. Tongari is his rival, who happen to share some similar traits of Honekawa Suneo. Buta Gorilla (Kumada Kaoru) is a typical neighborhood bully, who also share similar traits of Gian (Takeshi Goda) except that he often antagonizes Korosuke (though they are in grade school). (Source: Wikipedia)
opening_themes: "Oyome-san ni Natte Agenaizo (お嫁さんになってあげないゾ)" by Kaori Moritani (eps 1-24)
"Body Dake Ready (ボディーだけレディー)" by Junko Uchida (eps 25-60)
"Yumemiru Jikan 夢みる時間" by Megumi Mori (eps 61-86)
"Hajimete no Chuu (はじめてのチュウ)" by Anshin Papa (eps 87-108)
"Suimin Busoku (すいみん不足)" by Chicks (eps 109-170)
"Oryouri Koushinkyoku (お料理行進曲)" by Yuka (eps 171-331)
ending_themes: "Magical Boy Magical Heart (マジカルBoy マジカルHeart)" by Kaori Moritani (eps 1-16)
"Lace no Cardigan (レースのカーディガン)" by Kaori Sakagami (eps 17-24)
"Felt no Pencase (フェルトのペンケース)" by Megumi Mori (eps 61-86)
"Merry ha tada no Tomodachi" by Toshiko Fujita (eps 87-108)
"Hajimete no Chuu (はじめてのチュウ)" by Anshin Papa (あんしんパパ) (eps 109-170, 213-290, 311-331)
"Uwasa no Kiss (うわさのキッス)" by TOKIO (eps 291-310)
